description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初的军事将领，辛亥革命重要人物。
description.en: A Chinese military general during the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China, and a key figure in the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国福建省福州市马尾区的镇，是林述庆的出生地。
description.en: A town in Mawei District, Fuzhou, Fujian Province, China, and the birthplace of Lin Shuqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年北京附近的特别行政区划，是林述庆的逝世地。
description.en: A special administrative area near Beijing in the early years of the Republic of China, and the place of Lin Shuqing's death.

description.zh-cn: 清末在福建设立的军事学校。
description.en: A military academy established in Fujian during the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任国民政府主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the National Government.

description.zh-cn: 由林述庆、林森等在福建武备学堂期间创建的革命团体。
description.en: A revolutionary group founded by Lin Shuqing, Lin Sen, and others during their time at the Fujian Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 清末新军的编制单位之一，驻扎在南京。
description.en: One of the divisions of the New Army in the late Qing Dynasty, stationed in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国同盟会重要骨干，革命烈士。
description.en: An important member of the Tongmenghui and a revolutionary martyr.

description.zh-cn: 清末由孙中山等组织的革命团体。
description.en: A revolutionary group organized by Sun Yat-sen and others in the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 指1911年至1912年初，旨在推翻清朝专制帝制、建立共和政体的全国性革命。
description.en: A nationwide revolution from 1911 to early 1912 aimed at overthrowing the autocratic monarchy of the Qing Dynasty and establishing a republic.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命期间，林述庆在镇江成立的军政府。
description.en: A military government established by Lin Shuqing in Zhenjiang during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命期间由江苏和浙江两省革命军组成的联合部队。
description.en: An allied army formed by the revolutionary forces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang provinces during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国城市，曾是多个朝代的首都。辛亥革命期间被江浙联军攻克。
description.en: A Chinese city that served as the capital of several dynasties. It was captured by the Jiangsu-Zhejiang Allied Army during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代民主革命家。
description.en: A Chinese modern democratic revolutionary.

description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初政治人物。
description.en: A Chinese political figure in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国晚清时期至中华民国初期的军事及政治人物。
description.en: A Chinese military and political figure from the late Qing Dynasty to the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国（1912年—1949年）的国家元首办事机构。
description.en: The office of the head of state of the Republic of China (1912–1949).

description.zh-cn: 由林述庆等人于1912年发起的政治团体。
description.en: A political group initiated by Lin Shuqing and others in 1912.

description.zh-cn: 1913年中华民国国民党代理理事长宋教仁在上海被暗杀的事件。
description.en: The assassination of Song Jiaoren, the acting chairman of the Kuomintang of the Republic of China, in Shanghai in 1913.

description.zh-cn: 中国清末民初政治人物。
description.en: A Chinese political figure in the late Qing Dynasty and early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代文学家、翻译家。
description.en: A Chinese modern writer and translator.

description.zh-cn: 由林纾根据林述庆日记创作的小说。
description.en: A novel written by Lin Shu based on the diaries of Lin Shuqing.

description.zh-cn: 1902年被选拔入福建武备学堂学习。
description.en: In 1902, he was selected to study at the Fujian Military Academy.

description.zh-cn: 在福建武备学堂学习期间，与林森等创建革命团体“福建学生会”。
description.en: During his studies at the Fujian Military Academy, he co-founded the revolutionary group 'Fujian Student Association' with Lin Sen and others.

description.zh-cn: 与林述庆等创建革命团体“福建学生会”。
description.en: Co-founded the revolutionary group 'Fujian Student Association' with Lin Shuqing and others.

description.zh-cn: 在福建武备学堂学习期间共同创建了革命团体“福建学生会”。
description.en: They co-founded the revolutionary group 'Fujian Student Association' during their time at the Fujian Military Academy.

position.zh-cn: 队官、三营管带、二营管带
position.en: Company officer, 3rd Battalion Commander, 2nd Battalion Commander

description.zh-cn: 毕业后进入南洋新军第九镇任职，后担任管带。
description.en: After graduation, he joined the Ninth Division of the Nanyang New Army and later served as a battalion commander.

description.zh-cn: 在标统赵声的影响下，林述庆倾向革命党。
description.en: Under the influence of Regiment Commander Zhao Sheng, Lin Shuqing leaned towards the revolutionary party.

description.zh-cn: 率部起义，攻占镇江，响应辛亥革命。
description.en: Led his troops in an uprising, capturing Zhenjiang in response to the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 率部攻占镇江后，成立镇江军政府并自立为都督。
description.en: After capturing Zhenjiang with his troops, he established the Zhenjiang Military Government and declared himself military governor.

description.zh-cn: 率领镇江军一部参与江浙联军攻打南京。
description.en: Led a portion of the Zhenjiang army to participate in the Jiangsu-Zhejiang Allied Army's attack on Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 江浙联军于1911年11月底至12月初对南京发起进攻并最终攻克。
description.en: The Jiangsu-Zhejiang Allied Army launched an attack on Nanjing from late November to early December 1911, eventually capturing it.

description.zh-cn: 在宋教仁斡旋下，程德全接替林述庆出任江宁临时都督。
description.en: Through Song Jiaoren's mediation, Cheng Dequan succeeded Lin Shuqing as the provisional military governor of Jiangning.

description.zh-cn: 因反对袁世凯而被迫下野，后因在宋教仁遇刺案后扬言起兵复仇，为袁所忌并据信被其毒杀。
description.en: He was forced to step down due to his opposition to Yuan Shikai. Later, after vowing to raise troops for revenge following Song Jiaoren's assassination, he was feared by Yuan and is believed to have been poisoned by him.

description.zh-cn: 宋教仁被刺杀后，林述庆对袁世凯表示不满，扬言南下起兵复仇，此举导致袁世凯对其产生杀意。
description.en: After Song Jiaoren was assassinated, Lin Shuqing expressed dissatisfaction with Yuan Shikai and threatened to go south to raise troops for revenge, which led Yuan Shikai to develop murderous intent towards him.

description.zh-cn: 因忌惮林述庆在宋教仁案后的反应，据信袁世凯下令通过梁士诒将林述庆毒杀。
description.en: Fearing Lin Shuqing's reaction to the Song Jiaoren case, Yuan Shikai is believed to have ordered Liang Shiyi to poison and kill Lin Shuqing.

description.zh-cn: 据信，梁士诒在自己举办的家宴中执行了袁世凯的命令，毒杀了林述庆。
description.en: It is believed that Liang Shiyi carried out Yuan Shikai's orders and poisoned Lin Shuqing at a private banquet he hosted.

description.zh-cn: 林述庆身后留下的军中日记成为林纾创作小说《金陵秋》的素材。
description.en: The military diaries left behind by Lin Shuqing became the source material for Lin Shu's novel 'Autumn in Jinling'.

description.zh-cn: 根据林述庆的军中日记创作了小说《金陵秋》。
description.en: Wrote the novel 'Autumn in Jinling' based on Lin Shuqing's military diaries.
